metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18064 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description: cairo through 1.15.14 has an out-of-bounds stack-memory write duringprocessing of a crafted document by WebKitGTK+ because of the interactionbetween cairo-rectangular-scan-converter.c (the generate and render_rowsfunctions) and cairo-image-compositor.c (the _cairo_image_spans_and_zerofunction).

criterions.comment: cairo package in mantic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
